revision.text:
{{Primary sources|date=September 2012}} '''IBM Infosphere''' is a set of tools for information integration and management.
Based around a core '''Information Server''' it can 'talk' to databases such as its own '''InfoSphere Warehouse Enterprise'''<ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/warehouse/base.html IBM - InfoSphere Warehouse Enterprise Base Edition - Software]</ref> (based on [[IBM DB2]]), IBM's Big Data Analytics solution [[Netezza]],<ref>[http://www.redbooks.ibm.com/abstracts/redp4725.html?Open IBM Redbooks | The Netezza Data Appliance Architecture: A Platform for High Performance Data Warehousing and Analytics]</ref> SQL, Oracle and other databases or the Enterprise Service Bus or message brokers such as MQ series.
==Background== IBM Infosphere is a branded product line from [[IBM]] under its [[IBM Information Management Software|Information Management Software]] brand, announced in February 2008, which includes [[software]] products from its [[IBM WebSphere|WebSphere]] and [[Information Server]] product lines. Upon its announcement, included in the Infosphere product line were the IBM Infosphere [[Master Data Management]] Server and IBM Infosphere [[Data Warehouse|Warehouse]]. IBM Infosphere falls under IBM's Information On Demand initiative.
==IBM InfoSphere software== Key tools include: * [[IBM Information Server]] <ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/info-server/overview/ IBM - InfoSphere Information Server - Software]</ref> the core data integration platform * IBM Infosphere FastTrack <ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/fasttrack/ IBM - IBM Infosphere Information Server FastTrack 8.0.1 - InfoSphere FastTrack - Software]</ref> to carry out small, simple transformations (extract from system A and load into system B) * IBM InfoSphere DataStage <ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/datastage/ IBM - data integration, connectivity, scalable platforms - InfoSphere DataStage - Software]</ref> to carry out FastTrack ETLs or large volume transactions * IBM InfoSphere Information Services Director <ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/information-services-director/ IBM - InfoSphere Information Services Director - Software]</ref> to publish the data integration services and manage the load * IBM InfoSphere MashupHub <ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/mashup-hub/ IBM - IBM InfoSphere MashupHub Overview - InfoSphere MashupHub - Software]</ref> to mix and manage Web 2.0 services * IBM InfoSphere Information Analyzer <ref>[http://www-01.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/information-analyzer/ IBM - Data Profiling, Data Rules and Quality Monitoring - InfoSphere Information Analyzer - Software]</ref> to profile and track data quality * IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management * IBM InfoSphere Data Architect (formerly Rational Data Architect) * IBM InfoSphere Data Explorer
Other tools include: * IBM InfoSphere Master Data Management Server (formerly WebSphere Customer Center and WebSphere Product Center) * IBM InfoSphere Identity Insight Solutions (formerly known as InfoSphere Entity Analytic Solutions) * IBM InfoSphere Warehouse (formerly known as [[IBM DB2]] Warehouse) * [[IBM InfoSphere BigInsights]] * [[IBM InfoSphere Streams]] * IBM InfoSphere Change Data Capture (formerly [[DataMirror]]) * IBM [[Cognos]]
==External links== * [http://www.ibm.com/software/data/infosphere/ IBM InfoSphere home page]
